DOC.brief_summary: PF-06678552 new compound propose treatment hypercholesteremia . The primary purpose study evaluate safety tolerability , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics multiple oral dos PF-06678552 healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Multiple Dose Study Of PF-06678552 In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject nonchildbearing potential . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg Low density lipoprotein cholesterol 115 mg/dL 190 mg/dL Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose )
